books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: The chronicle of a tempestuous marriage comes to a close.
books.name: ONE WITH YOU

books.author: by J. R. Ward
books.description: Book 14 of the Black Dagger Brotherhood series.
books.name: THE BEAST

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: Secrets emerge when a television journalist searching for her birth mother covers the trial of the widow of a wealthy doctor.
books.name: AS TIME GOES BY

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: A retired Army helicopter pilot faces combat-related nightmares and mysteries concerning the deaths of her husband and sister.
books.name: FOOL ME ONCE

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: In the 37th Stone Barrington novel, the lawyer becomes entangled in a mystery involving a wealthy divorcee’s ex-husband.
books.name: FAMILY JEWELS

books.author: by Steve Berry
books.description: The covert operative Cotton Malone must thwart an agent loyal to the former Soviet Union.
books.name: THE 14TH COLONY

books.author: by Cynthia D'Aprix Sweeney
books.description: Siblings in a dysfunctional New York family must grapple with a reduced inheritance.
books.name: THE NEST

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: A mercenary escorts a doctor's daughter to Paris.
books.name: VIRGINS

books.author: by Bryan Reardon
books.description: A father discovers his son is suspected in a school shooting.
books.name: FINDING JAKE

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher pries open a missing-persons case that takes him across the country and into the shadowy reaches of the Internet.
books.name: MAKE ME

books.author: by Anna Quindlen
books.description: A young woman comes of age as her farm family's way of life is threatened.
books.name: MILLER'S VALLEY

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: A neurosurgeon checks out of the rat race and finds comfort with a mysterious hiker.
books.name: WHAT WE FIND

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Jack Morgan, the head of the Private global investigative agency, probes the murders of members of the French cultural elite.
books.name: PRIVATE PARIS
